title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
Introducing Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, your ultimate cleaning companion! With 12 rolls of Huge Rolls, each containing 158 sheets, you get the equivalent of 38 regular rolls - that's a lot of cleaning power!

Each roll boasts 2-ply sheets that are up to 75% more absorbent than the leading 1-ply brand. That means less waste, less time spent changing rolls, and more effective cleaning. And with the Flex-a-Size feature, you can choose between a full or half sheet, making these paper towels versatile for any job.

These towels come in packs of 6, with 2 packs in a single purchase, making it convenient for you to stock up. They're white, just like the Bounty Paper Towels you know and trust, but with the added benefits of Presto! Flex-a-Size.

Don't settle for less absorbent, less efficient paper towels. Choose Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels for a cleaner, greener, and more efficient home. Order now and experience the Presto! difference!
